cards.text: What's your most controversial opinion?
Do you think some cultures are better than others?
What's your take on the death penalty?
What's your take on the current education system and what would you change?
Do you think the system would work better with more centralization or decentralization?
Can you think of a system better than capitalism?
Do you think women have more struggles than men?
Do you think we are more shaped by culture or genetics?
What's your take on free will?
If you could live in any era, which would it be and why?
If you could implement one law, what would it be?
What do you think happens after death?
Do you like being human?
If you could erase one thing from existence, what would it be?
What is the most admirable aspect of human nature? What about the worst?
Do you think it's possible for men and women to only be friends?
What's a human characteristic that you believe will never change?
What do you think will be ridiculous in 10 years that is currently quite popular?
What's your purpose in the world?
Would the world be a better place without religion? Can we truly escape belief systems?
Is it true that happiness is the most important goal in life?
Is the value of everyone's life the same?
What do you think of the penitentiary system and what would you change?
Why are people so inclined to hold onto beliefs that cannot be proven?
How important do you think genes are in choosing friends and partners?
What's your take on addiction and how to deal with it?
Do you have taboos and do you think they are healthy?
How much do you think we are conditioned by our childhood and how it affects our relationships?
Is jealousy a normal thing in a relationship? Is it desirable?
In which direction do you think society is going? What are the scariest characteristics of our society?
What's your take on social media and how it affects our lives?
How much do you think the news is manipulated?
What's your take on monogamy?
Do you think slavery is inevitable?
What makes someone a good person?
Should voting be mandatory?
Is social media doing more harm than good to society?
Should there be a limit on how much wealth one person can accumulate?
Is it better to be honest and hurt someone or lie to protect them?
Do you think people can truly change?
Is privacy a right or a privilege in the modern world?
Should parents be held responsible for their children's actions?
Is ambition a virtue or a flaw?
Do you think everyone deserves a second chance?
Is it possible to have a truly unbiased opinion?
Should art ever be censored?
Is tradition worth preserving if it no longer serves a purpose?
Do you think technology is making us smarter or lazier?
Should people be required to do community service?
Is it ethical to eat meat?
Do celebrities have a responsibility to be role models?
Is competition healthy or destructive?
Should AI be allowed to make decisions that affect people's lives?
Is cancel culture a form of justice or mob mentality?
Is it ever justified to break the law for a moral cause?
Should drugs be decriminalized?
Do rich people have an obligation to give away their wealth?
Is nationalism inherently dangerous?
Should euthanasia be legal everywhere?
Is it ethical to genetically modify humans?
Do you think borders should exist?
Should we prioritize the economy over the environment?
Is political correctness helping or silencing society?
Should people be allowed to sell their own organs?
Is revenge ever morally justified?
Is it moral to sacrifice one person to save five?
Should there be a test to become a parent?
Is colonialism's legacy still more harmful than beneficial?
Would you report a family member who committed a serious crime?
Is it ethical to have children knowing the state of the world?
Should prisoners lose the right to vote?
Is patriotism just socially acceptable tribalism?
Should the ultra-wealthy be forced to fund public services?
Is it moral to profit from someone else's suffering?
Would the world be better without the concept of race?
Should there be an age limit for politicians?
Is it ethical to use animals for medical research?
Can war ever be morally right?
Do you think humanity deserves to survive as a species?
Should pedophiles receive treatment instead of prison?
Is total surveillance acceptable if it eliminates crime?
Should people with hereditary diseases be discouraged from having children?
Is democracy the best system, or just the least bad?
Should billionaires exist?
Is ignorance ever a valid excuse for harmful behavior?
Would you sacrifice your own freedom to guarantee peace for everyone else?
Is it ethical to lie under oath to protect someone you love?
Should terminally ill people have the right to try experimental drugs?
Does absolute power always corrupt, or can someone wield it wisely?
If you could eliminate all religion or all government, which would you choose and why?
